name: pic-stream-ai
description: High-quality photo and video sharing app with AI features

scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace pic-stream-ai-frontend start" "yarn workspace pic-stream-ai-backend dev"
scripts.build: yarn workspace pic-stream-ai-frontend build && yarn workspace pic-stream-ai-backend build
scripts.test: yarn workspace pic-stream-ai-frontend test && yarn workspace pic-stream-ai-backend test
